name: kaggle_search_models
description: Search Kaggle ML models. Returns model names, URLs, frameworks, and download counts.

steps.code: const results = []; const seen = new Set(); document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/models/"]').forEach(a => { const href = a.getAttribute('href') || ''; if (!href.match(/^\/models\/[^/]+\/[^/]+/) || seen.has(href)) return; seen.add(href); const title = a.textContent.trim(); if (!title || title.length > 200 || title.length < 3) return; const parent = a.closest('li') || a.parentElement; const metadata = parent ? Array.from(parent.querySelectorAll('span, p')).map(e => e.textContent.trim()).filter(t => t.length > 3 && t !== title).slice(0, 3) : []; results.push({ title: title.substring(0, 200), url: 'https://www.kaggle.com' + href, metadata: metadata.join(' | ') }); }); return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results: results.slice(0, 15) };
steps.name: results
steps.label: Extract models
